Name: General
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: ActivatorRefresh
Description: Refresh all activator device lights and controls

Name: SendKeys
Description: Send keys to active window

Name: SetDynamicValue1
Description: Set Dynamic Value to use when specifying Dynamic1 as a shortcut value.

Name: SetDynamicValue2
Description: Set Dynamic Value to use when specifying Dynamic2 as a shortcut value.

Name: SetDynamicValue3
Description: Set Dynamic Value to use when specifying Dynamic3 as a shortcut value.

Name: SetDynamicValue4
Description: Set Dynamic Value to use when specifying Dynamic4 as a shortcut value.

Name: Audio
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: Audio
Description: Toggle Audio Mute On/Off

Name: AudioBus
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: AudioBusOff
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: AudioBusOn
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: AudioChannelMatrixApplyPreset
Description: Apply preset to channel matrix

Name: AudioPluginOff
Description: Turn off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: AudioPluginOn
Description: Turn on Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: AudioPluginOnOff
Description: Toggle on/off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: AudioPluginShow
Description: Show Audio Plugin Editor, starting from 1

Name: BusAAudioPluginOff
Description: Turn off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusAAudioPluginOn
Description: Turn on Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusAAudioPluginOnOff
Description: Toggle on/off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusAAudioPluginShow
Description: Show Audio Plugin Editor, starting from 1

Name: BusBAudioPluginOff
Description: Turn off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusBAudioPluginOn
Description: Turn on Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusBAudioPluginOnOff
Description: Toggle on/off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusBAudioPluginShow
Description: Show Audio Plugin Editor, starting from 1

Name: BusXAudio
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXAudioOff
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXAudioOn
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXAudioPluginOff
Description: Turn off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusXAudioPluginOn
Description: Turn on Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusXAudioPluginOnOff
Description: Toggle on/off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: BusXAudioPluginShow
Description: Show Audio Plugin Editor, starting from 1

Name: BusXSendToMaster
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXSendToMasterOff
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXSendToMasterOn
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXSolo
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXSoloOff
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: BusXSoloOn
Description: M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G

Name: MasterAudioPluginOff
Description: Turn off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: MasterAudioPluginOn
Description: Turn on Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: MasterAudioPluginOnOff
Description: Toggle on/off Audio Plugin, starting from 1

Name: MasterAudioPluginShow
Description: Show Audio Plugin Editor, starting from 1

Name: SetBalance
Description: Value = Balance -1-1

Name: SetBusAVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusBVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusCVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusDVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusEVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusFVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetBusGVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetGain
Description: Value = Gain dB 0-24

Name: SetGainChannel1
Description: Value = Gain dB 0-24

Name: SetGainChannel2
Description: Value = Gain dB 0-24

Name: SetHeadphonesVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetMasterVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetVolume
Description: Value = Volume 0-100

Name: SetVolumeChannel1
Description: When using SeparateMono on an Audio Input, this can be used to set channel volumes independently.

Name: SetVolumeChannel2
Description: When using SeparateMono on an Audio Input, this can be used to set channel volumes independently.

Name: SetVolumeChannelMixer
Description: Set Volume of an Input's sub channel (1 to 16)

Name: SetVolumeFade
Description: Set volume gradually over x milliseconds.

Name: Transition
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: CutDirect
Description: Cuts the input directly to Output without changing Preview

Name: FadeToBlack
Description: Toggle FTB On/Off

Name: SetFader
Description: Set Master Fader T-Bar, 255 will cut to Preview

Name: SetTransitionDuration1
Description: Change Transition Duration for Button 1

Name: SetTransitionDuration2
Description: Change Transition Duration for Button 2

Name: SetTransitionDuration3
Description: Change Transition Duration for Button 3

Name: SetTransitionDuration4
Description: Change Transition Duration for Button 4

Name: SetTransitionEffect1
Description: Change Transition for Button 1

Name: SetTransitionEffect2
Description: Change Transition for Button 2

Name: SetTransitionEffect3
Description: Change Transition for Button 3

Name: SetTransitionEffect4
Description: Change Transition for Button 4

Name: Transition1
Description: Clicks one of the four Transition buttons in the main vMix window.

Name: Output
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: Fullscreen
Description: Toggles Fullscreen On or Off

Name: SetOutput2
Description: Change what is displayed on Output 2.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: SetOutput3
Description: Change what is displayed on Output 3.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: SetOutput4
Description: Change what is displayed on Output 4.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: SetOutputExternal2
Description: Change what is displayed on the External2 output.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: SetOutputFullscreen
Description: Change what is displayed on the Fullscreen output.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: SetOutputFullscreen2
Description: Change what is displayed on the Fullscreen2 output.
Parameters: Output,Preview,MultiView,Input Value = Output, Preview, MultiView, Input Value,Input

Name: Snapshot
Description: Create a snapshot image of the current Output. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg

Name: SnapshotInput
Description: Create a snapshot image of the selected Input. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg

Name: StartSRTOutput
Description: Optional output number starting from 0. Leave blank to control Output 1 only.

Name: StartStopSRTOutput
Description: Optional output number starting from 0. Leave blank to control Output 1 only.

Name: StartStopStreaming
Description: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

Name: StartStreaming
Description: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

Name: StopSRTOutput
Description: Optional output number starting from 0. Leave blank to control Output 1 only.

Name: StopStreaming
Description: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

Name: StreamingSetKey
Description: Set Key on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,mystreamkey

Name: StreamingSetPassword
Description: Set Password on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,password

Name: StreamingSetURL
Description: Set URL on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,rtmp://myurl/

Name: StreamingSetUsername
Description: Set Username on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,username

Name: WriteDurationToRecordingLog
Description: Write current recording duration to log file with optional tag text Value.

Name: Title
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: AdjustCountdown
Description: Seconds to add or subtract from current Countdown time

Name: ChangeCountdown
Description: Change countdown time according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)

Name: PauseCountdown
Description: Pause or Resume Countdown or if complete, Start from beginning.

Name: PauseRender
Description: Freeze Title Input while making multiple updates

Name: ResumeRender
Description: Resume Title Input rendering after making multiple updates

Name: SelectTitlePreset
Description: Value = Preset Index

Name: SetCountdown
Description: Set countdown duration according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)

Name: SetImage
Description: Change Image in Title according to Filename or empty to clear. SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select image.

Name: SetImageVisible
Description: Toggle Image Visibility in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select image.

Name: SetImageVisibleOff
Description: Hide Image in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select image.

Name: SetImageVisibleOn
Description: Show Image in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select image.

Name: SetText
Description: Change Text in Title according to Value parameter. SelectedIndex or SelectedName can be used to select Text Field

Name: SetTextColour
Description: Change Colour of Text in Title in HTML format (#xxxxxx)

Name: SetTextVisible
Description: Toggle Text Visibility in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select text field.

Name: SetTextVisibleOff
Description: Hide Text in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select text field.

Name: SetTextVisibleOn
Description: Show Text in Title SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select text field.

Name: SetTickerSpeed
Description: Change Ticker Speed. SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select ticker field.

Name: StopCountdown
Description: Stop and Reset Countdown

Name: SuspendCountdown
Description: Pause Countdown Only

Name: TitleBeginAnimation
Description: Value = Animation

Name: Input
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: ActiveInput
Description: Send to Output the selected Input

Name: AddInput
Description: Create a new Input based on information provided in Value. Video|c:\path\to\video.avi Image|c:\path\to\image.jpg Photos|c:\path\to\folder Title|c:\path\to\title.gtzip VideoList|c:\path\to\playlist.m3u Colour|HTMLColor AudioFile|c:\path\to\audio.wav Flash|c:\path\to\flash.swf PowerPoint|c:\path\to\powerpoint.pptx

Name: AutoPlayFirst
Description: Toggle automatically playing first item in a List with Transition

Name: AutoPlayFirstOff
Description: Turn Off automatically playing first item in a List with Transition

Name: AutoPlayFirstOn
Description: Turn On automatically playing first item in a List with Transition

Name: AutoPlayNext
Description: Toggle automatically playing next item in a List

Name: AutoPlayNextOff
Description: Turn Off automatically playing next item in a List

Name: AutoPlayNextOn
Description: Turn On automatically playing next item in a List

Name: ColourCorrectionAuto
Description: Basic Auto Colour Correction.

Name: ColourCorrectionReset
Description: Reset Colour Correction to Default Values.

Name: CreateVirtualInput
Description: Create a new Virtual Input from the specified Input.

Name: InputPreviewHide
Description: Hides large preview of input

Name: InputPreviewShow
Description: Shows large preview of input

Name: InputPreviewShowHide
Description: Toggles large preview of input

Name: LayerOff
Description: Turn Off Layer For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: LayerOn
Description: Turn On Layer For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: LayerOnOff
Description: Toggle On/Off Layer For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: ListAdd
Description: Add Filename to List

Name: ListExport
Description: Export List as M3U to Filename

Name: ListRemove
Description: Remove from List by Index starting from 1

Name: ListRemoveAll
Description: Remove all items from List

Name: ListShuffle
Description: Shuffle (randomize) List

Name: MoveInput
Description: Value = Number

Name: MoveLayer
Description: Move Layer in Input according to Value parameter. Example: 1,2 moves Layer1 to Layer2

Name: NextItem
Description: Move to next item in List

Name: NextPicture
Description: Move to Next Picture for Photo and PowerPoint Inputs

Name: PreviewInput
Description: Send to Preview the selected Input

Name: PreviewInputNext
Description: Send to Preview the next Input

Name: PreviewInputPrevious
Description: Send to Preview the previous Input

Name: PreviousItem
Description: Move to previous item in List

Name: PreviousPicture
Description: Move to Previous Picture for Photo and PowerPoint Inputs

Name: Restart
Description: Restart selected Input

Name: SaveVideoDelay
Description: Save video clip from Video Delay according to Duration in milliseconds

Name: SelectCategory
Description: Change to Category according to Value (All,Red,Green,Orange,Purple,Aqua,Blue,Search)

Name: SelectIndex
Description: Photos,List: Selects item in List according to Value starting from number 1 Virtual Set: Zooms to selected preset using the current speed settings

Name: SetAlpha
Description: Set Input transparency according to Value. 0 is transparent, 255 is opaque

Name: SetCCGainB
Description: Change Gain R level of Input. 1=Original

Name: SetCCGainG
Description: Change Gain R level of Input. 1=Original

Name: SetCCGainR
Description: Change Gain R level of Input. 1=Original

Name: SetCCGainRGB
Description: Change Gain RGB level of Input. 1=Original

Name: SetCCGammaB
Description: Change Gamma B level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCGammaG
Description: Change Gamma G level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCGammaR
Description: Change Gamma R level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCGammaRGB
Description: Change Gamma RGB level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCHue
Description: Change Hue level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCLiftB
Description: Change Lift B level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCLiftG
Description: Change Lift G level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCLiftR
Description: Change Lift R level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCLiftRGB
Description: Change Lift RGB level of Input. 0=Original

Name: SetCCSaturation
Description: Change Saturation level of Input. 0=Original, -1=Greyscale

Name: SetDynamicInput1
Description: Set Dynamic Input from Input Name or Number

Name: SetDynamicInput2
Description: Set Dynamic Input from Input Name or Number

Name: SetDynamicInput3
Description: Set Dynamic Input from Input Name or Number

Name: SetDynamicInput4
Description: Set Dynamic Input from Input Name or Number

Name: SetInputName
Description: Set the Display Name of the Input

Name: SetLayer
Description: Change Layer in Input according to Value parameter. Example: 1,2 changes Layer1 to Input2

Name: SetPanX
Description: Change current PanX value of Input. 0=centered, -2=100% to left, 2=100% to right

Name: SetPanY
Description: Change current PanY value of Input. 0=centered, -2=100% to bottom, 2=100% to top

Name: SetPictureEffect
Description: Set transition effect for Photos and PowerPoint Inputs (Fade, Zoom, etc)

Name: SetPictureEffectDuration
Description: Set duration of transition effect in Milliseconds

Name: SetPictureTransition
Description: Set transition time between Photos and PowerPoint slides in Seconds

Name: SetPosition
Description: Set Position of selected Input according to Value in Milliseconds

Name: SetRate
Description: Set Playback speed/rate for Videos and Video Delays 0.5=50%,1=100%,2=200% etc

Name: SetRateSlowMotion
Description: Set Slow Motion speed for Instant Replay 0.5=50%,1=100% etc

Name: SetZoom
Description: Change current Zoom level of Input. 1=100%, 0.5=50%, 2=200%

Name: VideoCallAudioSource
Description: Master,Headphones,BusA,BusB,BusC,BusD,BusE,BusF,BusG

Name: VideoCallVideoSource
Description: Output1,Output2,Output3,Output4

Name: VideoDelayStartRecording
Description: Start Video Delay Recording

Name: VideoDelayStartStopRecording
Description: Toggle Video Delay Recording

Name: VideoDelayStopRecording
Description: Stop Video Delay Recording

Name: WaitForCompletion
Description: Wait for a Video Input to reach the end of playback.

Name: Overlay
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: MoveMultiViewOverlay
Description: Move Overlay in Input MultiView according to Value parameter. Example: 1,2 moves Overlay1 to Overlay2

Name: MultiViewOverlay
Description: Toggle On/Off MultiView Overlay For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: MultiViewOverlayOff
Description: Turn Off MultiView Overlay For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: MultiViewOverlayOn
Description: Turn On MultiView Overlay For Input At Index (starting from 1)

Name: OverlayInput1
Description: Toggle Overlay1 On/Off with selected Input using configured Transition

Name: OverlayInput1In
Description: Transition Out to Overlay1 with selected Input

Name: OverlayInput1Off
Description: Immediately switch Overlay1 Off (Cut)

Name: OverlayInput1Out
Description: Transition Out Overlay1

Name: OverlayInput1Zoom
Description: Zooms PIP Overlay to fill Fullscreen and vice versa

Name: OverlayInputAllOff
Description: Immediately switch all Overlays Off

Name: PreviewOverlayInput1
Description: Preview Overlay1 using the selected Input

Name: SetMultiViewOverlay
Description: Change Layer in Input MultiView according to Value parameter. Example: 1,2 changes Layer 1 to Input2

Name: PlayList
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: NextPlayListEntry
Description: Move to Next Item in a running PlayList

Name: PreviousPlayListEntry
Description: Move to Previous Item in a running PlayList

Name: SelectPlayList
Description: Open PlayList with Name matching Value

Name: Scripting
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: ScriptStart
Description: Value = Script Name

Name: ScriptStartDynamic
Description: Start a dynamic script using code specified as the Value.

Name: ScriptStop
Description: Value = Script Name

Name: Replay
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: ReplayChangeSpeed
Description: Value = Speed

Name: ReplayCopyLastEvent
Description: Value = Event List 0-19

Name: ReplayCopySelectedEvent
Description: Value = Event List 0-19

Name: ReplayExportLastEvent
Description: Value = Folder

Name: ReplayJumpFrames
Description: Value = Frames

Name: ReplayJumpFramesFastOff
Description: ReplayJumpFrames jumps 1 frame for each value instead of 1 second.

Name: ReplayJumpFramesFastOn
Description: ReplayJumpFrames jumps 1 second for each value instead of 1 frame.

Name: ReplayLastEventCameraOff
Description: Turns off the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplayLastEventCameraOn
Description: Turns on the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplayLastEventSingleCameraOn
Description: Turns on only the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplayMarkInOut
Description: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

Name: ReplayMarkInOutLive
Description: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

Name: ReplayMarkInOutRecorded
Description: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

Name: ReplayMoveLastEvent
Description: Value = Event List 0-19

Name: ReplayMoveSelectedEvent
Description: Value = Event List 0-19

Name: ReplayMoveSelectedInPoint
Description: Value = Frames

Name: ReplayMoveSelectedOutPoint
Description: Value = Frames

Name: ReplayPlayAllEvents
Description: Play all Events in active list

Name: ReplayPlayAllEventsToOutput
Description: Play all Events in active list

Name: ReplayPlayEvent
Description: Value = Event Number 0-1000

Name: ReplayPlayEventsByID
Description: Value = List of IDs

Name: ReplayPlayEventsByIDToOutput
Description: Value = List of IDs

Name: ReplayPlayEventToOutput
Description: Value = Event Number 0-1000

Name: ReplaySelectAllEvents
Description: Select all events in active channel.

Name: ReplaySelectedEventCameraOff
Description: Turns off the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplaySelectedEventCameraOn
Description: Turns on the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplaySelectedEventSingleCameraOn
Description: Turns on only the specified camera angle (1-8)

Name: ReplaySetAudioSource
Description: Name as per dropdown box. e.g 'Camera1'

Name: ReplaySetLastEventText
Description: Value = Text

Name: ReplaySetLastEventTextCamera
Description: Changes the text of the specified angle (1-4), example: 3,angle3text

Name: ReplaySetSelectedEventText
Description: Value = Text

Name: ReplaySetSelectedEventTextCamera
Description: Changes the text of the specified angle (1-4), example: 3,angle3text

Name: ReplaySetSpeed
Description: See SetRateSlowMotion

Name: ReplaySwapChannels
Description: Swap A to B and vice versa, includes angles and playback status.

Name: ReplayUpdateSelectedInPoint
Description: Update In point of Selected Event to current Position.

Name: ReplayUpdateSelectedOutPoint
Description: Update Mark Out point of Selected Event to current Position.

Name: ReplayUpdateSelectedSpeed
Description: Update Selected Event to use Current Speed.

Name: ReplayUpdateSelectedSpeedDefault
Description: Update Selected Event to use Default Speed.

Name: NDI
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: NDICommand
Description: Send specified command to NDI source

Name: NDISelectSourceByIndex
Description: Value = Index 0-100

Name: NDISelectSourceByName
Description: Value = Name

Name: PTZ
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: PTZCreateVirtualInput
Description: Creates a PTZ Virtual Input with the current Position

Name: PTZFocusFar
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZFocusNear
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveDown
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveDownLeft
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveDownRight
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveLeft
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveRight
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveStop
Description: Stop all PTZ movement

Name: PTZMoveToVirtualInputPosition
Description: Moves to the Position of the PTZ Virtual Input without selecting it into Preview

Name: PTZMoveToVirtualInputPositionByIndex
Description: Moves to the Position of the PTZ Virtual Input associated with this Input. Index is first Input found starting from 0

Name: PTZMoveUp
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveUpLeft
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZMoveUpRight
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZUpdateVirtualInput
Description: Updates selected PTZ Virtual Input with current Position

Name: PTZZoomIn
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: PTZZoomOut
Description: Value = Speed 0-1

Name: Preset
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: LastPreset
Description: Load the last preset.

Name: OpenPreset
Description: Load preset from the specified Filename.

Name: SavePreset
Description: Save preset to the specified Filename.

Name: DataSources
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: DataSourceAutoNextOff
Description: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

Name: DataSourceAutoNextOn
Description: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

Name: DataSourceAutoNextOnOff
Description: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

Name: DataSourceNextRow
Description: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

Name: DataSourcePause
Description: Name of Data Source eg 'Excel/CSV'

Name: DataSourcePlay
Description: Name of Data Source eg 'Excel/CSV'

Name: DataSourcePlayPause
Description: Name of Data Source eg 'Excel/CSV'

Name: DataSourcePreviousRow
Description: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

Name: DataSourceSelectRow
Description: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) and Row Index starting from 0 eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1,5'

Name: Browser
Description: Category Header (not a function)

Name: BrowserNavigate
Description: URL
